about_the_game:
NUI is a game about farewell, a minimalistic puzzle-platformer where a mysterious character carries a sword deeply tied to him.

The sword must be taken to the end of the cave, while the sword limits the character movements, it can also be used as a powerful weapon. However, due to the bond with the sword distancing too much from it will damage you...



  • A small puzzle-platformer with a minimalistic and touching story about farewell.
  • Discover the way to carry your sword to the end of each screen
  • Explore an ancient cave with 50 levels that mix platforming skills and puzzles
  • More than 15 secrets scattered through the cave to be found
  • Small Game: Main game can be completed in less than 1 hour



NUI is a small passion project made in our free time, for that reason, it is meant to be a short and fun experience.
Let us here your thoughts and suggestions about it! Contact us by any of the links available at
Have fun playing it!
detailed_description:
NUI is a game about farewell, a minimalistic puzzle-platformer where a mysterious character carries a sword deeply tied to him.

The sword must be taken to the end of the cave, while the sword limits the character movements, it can also be used as a powerful weapon. However, due to the bond with the sword distancing too much from it will damage you...



  • A small puzzle-platformer with a minimalistic and touching story about farewell.
  • Discover the way to carry your sword to the end of each screen
  • Explore an ancient cave with 50 levels that mix platforming skills and puzzles
  • More than 15 secrets scattered through the cave to be found
  • Small Game: Main game can be completed in less than 1 hour



NUI is a small passion project made in our free time, for that reason, it is meant to be a short and fun experience.
Let us here your thoughts and suggestions about it! Contact us by any of the links available at
Have fun playing it!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

name: NUI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: NUI is a minimalist puzzle-platformer about farewell where health is linked to your sword.
